So I try to in the SPH to change the symmetry to MM instead of 2r however when I hovered over the part I wanted to attach my landing wheels on, it snapped back to 2r so I tried to middle click on it to make it snap then I went to attach it but it did the same thing so I clicked R and went to attach it but it snapped back to 2r.

 

 

So how do I fix this its getting very troublesome.

 

http://prntscr.com/ns5abg    and    http://prntscr.com/ns58r9 

Edited May 23, 2019 by MarkvirsII
Any chance the wings were attached using the wrong one?  You can't attach gear in mirror symmetry if the wings were attached with radial.

9 hours ago, MarkvirsII said:

So how do I fix this its getting very troublesome.

Depending on how i feel i do two things.

First i check and fix what Geonovast said, seeing if the part you putting the wheels has the wrong symmetry.(wings etc).

This might take a lot of time if you already completed a complex wing or a part of your craft.

So sometimes i just place the wheels to a part that is making them snap the right way and i shift move them to the correct place.

This might lead to some weird results if you crash the plane though, or well you can kinda ''cheese'' the system and make the wheels stronger by placing them in the main structural part of the plane.
